description: This header file defines internal API functions for managing an array of unsigned integers within the AnscUIntArray component, part of the CcspCommonLibrary.

methods.name: AnscUIntArrayGetSize
methods.description: Retrieves the size of the unsigned int array.

methods.name: AnscUIntArraySetSize
methods.description: Sets a new size for the array, potentially enlarging it.

methods.name: AnscUIntArrayRemoveAll
methods.description: Removes all elements from the array.

methods.name: AnscUIntArrayGetAt
methods.description: Gets the element at a specified index.

methods.name: AnscUIntArraySetAt
methods.description: Sets the element at a specified index.

methods.name: AnscUIntArrayInsertAt
methods.description: Inserts elements at a specific position.

methods.name: AnscUIntArrayRemoveAt
methods.description: Removes elements from a specific position.

methods.name: AnscUIntArrayAdd
methods.description: Adds an element to the end of the array.

methods.name: AnscUIntArrayEnlargeStorage
methods.description: Enlarges the internal storage capacity of the array.

methods.name: AnscUIntArrayFind
methods.description: Finds the index of a specific element in the array.
